subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Margaret Downey/ImAtTheTalkTherapy.mp3 
  Uploaded by : itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
  Description : This is my first attempt using the SJ Allophones file and EVP Maker (thanks, Stefan!).  I asked, "Is anybody there?" Someone replies, "I'M AT THE TALK THERAPY GROUP.  YES, I'M HERE.  HOW CAN I DO YOU FOR?  LET'S TALK FOR A MOMENT."  note:  non-relevant portions have been removed between phrases. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Margaret%20Downey/ImAtTheTalkTherapy.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...>
